roleset.name: conceptualization of a mental image
roleset.note: IDEATION-N NOTES: Comparison to verb-envision.01. (from ideation.01-n)

example.name: ideate-v
example.text: On behalf of that party, he ideated a few populist policies like free Internet in every hostel room and introducing a cheaper student pass for the local metro.
example.arg: a few populist policies like free Internet in every hostel room and introducing a cheaper student pass for the local metro

example.name: ideation-n
example.text: the individual is limited to the functioning of his own vocal muscles in his ideation of the sounds of words.
